User abbreviations

Abbreviations

Because in this documentation are abbreviations widely used here should be this abbreviations shortly described.

Abbreviation
NameDescription
GETGET HTTP request defined in RFC 2616 http://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc2616.txt
HEADHEAD HTTP request defined in RFC 2616 http://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc2616.txt
HTMLDefined in HTML 4.01 http://www.w3.org/TR/html401/
HTTPDefined in RFC 2616 http://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc2616.txt
JPAJava Persistence API http://docs.oracle.com/javaee/5/tutorial/doc/?wp406141&JavaEETutorialPartFour.html
LDAPLightweight Directory Access Protocol http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lightweight_Directory_Access_Protocol
OPOpenID Provider - provide user authentication
RPRelying Party - rely in user authentication provided by OP
SSOSingle Sign On http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Single_sign-on
UIUser Interface
URLUniform Resource Locator defined in RFC 3986 http://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc3986.txt
XRDSeXtensible Resource Descriptor Sequence http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/XRDS
XRIExtensible Resource Identifiers specification https://www.oasis-open.org/committees/download.php/15377/xri-syntax-V2.0-cs.pdf
